title: A climate mystery: the eruption of 1809

media:group.media:title: A climate mystery: the eruption of 1809
media:group.media:description:
Stay up to date with Morning Brew! https://morningbrewdaily.com/simon

This video is about a climate cold case. Literally. But one that may soon have an answer. Which volcano caused the cooling of 1809?

Become a patron and get access to exclusive content at http://www.patreon.com/simonoxfphys

Prof Wilson: https://risweb.st-andrews.ac.uk/portal/en/persons/rob-wilson(6d1ae425-21f0-432e-b260-500ee7888f04).html
Dr Burke: https://risweb.st-andrews.ac.uk/portal/en/persons/andrea-burke(c8a790cd-9091-47dc-ad47-45279cb78fc5).html

Music by Epidemic Sound: http://epidemicsound.com
Edited by Luke Negus.

What caused the cooling of 1809? This video essay similar to Kurzgesagt, Smarter Every Day, Veritasium and other science YouTube channels helps you understanding volcanic cooling. How do volcanoes change the climate? Which volcano erupted in 1809? How can we tell?
